author: Salvatore Calabrese
description: As the name suggests, fino sherry and caper brine add saltiness but this 'Salty Martini' also has a distinct nuttiness from the sherry. We'd suggest both a long stir for generous dilution, and serving with grilled almonds.
name: Salty Martini

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
